content.prompt: One of the first actions taken by Mikhail Gorbachev when he became leader of the Soviet Union in 1985 was to

purge political opponents in both the Soviet Union and the Eastern European nations
expand Soviet military commitments in Afghanistan and Eastern Europe
stamp out democratic movements throughout the Soviet bloc
